markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Fortune Teller](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=424)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

The strands of fate are clear to you, as you have learned many traditional forms by which laypeople can divine the future. You might have used these skills to guide your community, or simply to make money. But even the slightest peek into these practices connects you to the occult mysteries of the universe.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) skill, and the [Fortune-Telling Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Oddity Identification](/Feats.aspx?ID=817) skill feat.
name: Fortune Teller

text: Fortune Teller Source Player Core pg. 86 2.0 The strands of fate are clear to you, as you have learned many traditional forms by which laypeople can divine the future. You might have used these skills to guide your community, or simply to make money. But even the slightest peek into these practices connects you to the occult mysteries of the universe. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Occultism skill, and the Fortune-Telling Lore skill. You gain the Oddity Identification skill feat.
